channel.title: When will the Apostle Noble-Twin confirmation problem be fixed?
channel.description:
It seems like such a simple fix ... hide the Noble-Twin notification from the court unless it changes the outcome of the trial. But the problem has been around for months.
Also there was a game where Assassin beat King in a 1v1 because the day was so short, his distract prevented the King from pointing the finger before day ended. Now I believe Royal Finger and Distract become clickable at the same exact time which means it's a who-clicks-first game, which is not fun and is just like the old Reaper chill thing before it was patched.
So if the devs want Distract beating King in a 1v1 to remain a viable strategy I would like them to let it become clickable BEFORE royal finger so the winner is not determined by who clicks first or who has faster internet connection.

item.title: When will the Apostle Noble-Twin confirmation problem be fixed?
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
I dislike almost all neutrals currently. But current merc is very boring for me. Randomly trying to SG someone and when someone is outed or suspicious then you SG them. I don’t feel like there is much behind merc right now. Comparing this to my idea for merc with contract it seems kinda downgraded
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/merc-rework-with-contract/71903

Read full topic
